author: raghushantha

comments.author: joeyaiello
comments.body: Just to verify: we'll merge this when the repo becomes public?

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: I think we should merge this now, but I really think we should remove the token as we are less than a week from being public.

comments.author: lzybkr
comments.body:
tools/download.sh has a shared readonly token that anyone could use, so a better change is to use that in install.sh instead of telling people to create their own token.

I'm closing this PR in favor of doing nothing, or my suggestion above.

title: Create README.md & Add linux install instructions
